narrative:
This is a focused inspection to address the Direct Non-compliant item listed under Veterinary Care 2.40 (b)(2) on
the July 21, 2015 inspection report. The following animals have been evaluated and treated by a licensed
veterinarian: 
The male Shih Tzu dog approximately 7 years of age (microchip number 104090363) and the male Bichon dog
approximately 8 years of age (microchip number 080870010).
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
 
Inspection and exit interview conducted with the owner and IDALS.
